Package uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid

Interface Summary
JHOVE2IAnalysisController Reverse-engineered interface to captures static constants fields used by various DROID classes Static fields are a copy of methods from class uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid in the UK National Archives DROID distribution.
 

Class Summary
ConfigFile Class to hold configuration data for the uk.
FileCollection Class to hold configuration data for the uk.
FileFormatHit holds the description of a hit (format identifier) on a file
IdentificationFile Reprsents an analysed or to be analysed file.
IndexedHashSet<K,V> A data structure to store unique values indexed by a given key.
JHOVE2AnalysisControllerUtil Makes static utility methods out of some non-static classes from uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.AnalysisController to make it possible to cache both the configuration file and the signature file Some minor adaptations were made to those methods as required
MessageDisplay Allows messages to be displayed in the most appropriate manner to the user.
